channel.title: Super server
channel.description:
i have a great idea to make a server that has all the qualitys of rs but has codes and special shops so, that meens -working minigames -working quests -working npcs -all the cool items -working emotes -posibly god wars -maybe realistic random events -and a great staff!!
please reply i need lots of help :P

item.title: Super server
item.dc:creator: @soxfan24_7 soxfan24 7
item.description:
@soxfan24_7 wrote:

where to start ill make you some npc’s that say what your name is and when your logged on

  1. open your npchandler.java

2.searchif (npcs[i].npcType ==

  1. copy and paste under that code } if (npcs[i].npcType == (the npc id you want) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "(what you want him to say)!"; }
    and that is a npc sayiong something

  2. then under that copy and paste this. } if (npcs[i].npcType == 170) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "There Are "+ PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" Players Online !"; }

that is a npc saying how many people are on

  1. this is the code for a npc saying if a player is onelse if (npcs[i].npcType == 2262) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if(PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("soxfan") { npcs[i].textUpdate = "(the owners username) is on say ello!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "soxfan is not on at the moment"; } }

and there you go hope it helped[br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 08:56:02 AM[/size][hr]these were directly from mi server soxfans-world

Read full topic
